title: A Second Chance At Love
description: In a small, 'safe' town, two mother's, two young girls, live a few streets apart, unaware of one another's existence.One young girl mysteriously disappears from her yard ..seemingly just vanishing into thin air....No witnesses, and certainly no suspects...yet.The other young girl and her mother, leads the Police directly to the crime scene within two hours of the kidnapping.When asked how she knew such detail about the criminal and the crime scene, she shrugged her petite shoulders, and pointed to her forehead, saying "I saw it here."Aged six, psychic child Angelique Templeton, had already proven that paranormal phenomena does indeed exist, through demonstrating her strong psychic abilities and visions.Twenty years later, Angelique is a successful business owner in a lovely coastal town, but longs for a normal, loving relationship.Her spirit guides have planned her life since her birth, and are working behind the scenes.When she is introduced to Chandler, she has a deja-vu moment that they were also lovers in a previous lifetime. He is handsome, charming, and very sexy...they seem to be the perfect couple.However, there is only one small problem.... he is a very sceptical man. He loves her, but does not believe in paranormal phenomena.That is, until he ignores one of Angelique's visions....
author: P.S. Olivier
